General.Name: JOONGANG DNM Co.Ltd
General.Description: JOONGANG DNM Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells windows, doors, ventilation flat ducts in the Middle East, Asia, and internationally. It offers PVC sashes, inner and ABS doors, system windows, profiles, stiffeners, handles and crescents, and other components. The company was formerly known as CentralBio Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JOONGANG DNM Co.,Ltd in June 2021. JOONGANG DNM Co.,Ltd was founded in 1980 and is based in Anyang-si, South Korea.
